title: Expert Competency Development Program for Designing Inclusive Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to design digital learning environments that overcome cultural differences and language barriers for learners preparing to enter medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can execute three effective communication strategies among multicultural learners using a collaborative learning platform.
Learners can design personalized language education content for individual learners by applying adaptive learning technology.
Learners can develop a rubric to evaluate a digital learning environment reflecting accessibility requirements through VR simulation.
Learners can diagnose factors contributing to low learning engagement and suggest improvements based on LMS data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
